comments:
I'm using the CDT 3.0M6 candidate found:
http://download.eclipse.org/tools/cdt/builds/3.0.0/I.I200504110306/index.html

Window->Preferences->C/C++->Debug->GDB MI
change one to invalid value (i.e. a text string)
change the other to invalid value (i.e. a text string)
change one back to valid value (i.e. 100)
then the other invalid value is accepted
clicking OK causes "An error has occurred.  See error log for more details."

error log shows:
